hero.headline: FinTech Cloud Solution Architect & MERN Stack Engineering designing and delivering secure, scalable enterprise solutions that align with complex business needs. Expert in security-first architecture design, vendor management, and leading cross-functional teams. Adept at developing strategic technical roadmaps and executing phased deployments of mission-critical platforms.
hero.summary: Engineering leader with 13+ years of experience delivering secure, cloud-native, and AI-augmented platforms across fintech, aviation operations, and enterprise systems. Proven in scaling high-performing teams, building mission-critical products, and driving measurable business impact.
hero.value: Building resilient fintech and AI-powered products that scale globally.
